data.title: Law firm and lawyer rankings from The Legal 500 Europe, Middle East & Africa guide
data.meta_description: Market-leading rankings and editorial commentary - see the top law firms & lawyers for Dispute resolution in Belgium
data.text:
‘Very positive experience: in-depth knowledge combined with pragmatic approach – highly reactive – clear, efficient and to the point.’

‘A&O lawyers are integrated team members, that engage with their legal expertise but even beyond with business and project expertise. They get familiar with company specifics quickly and understand business needs. The advice is clear, they drive the topics, raise the right questions to align on strategies. Young lawyers are well trained and promoted by partners with trust and reliability.’

‘Great to work with, smart, accessible, and pragmatic.’

‘The team is young and diverse. They are available and collaborative.’

‘We had very good contact with Olivier van der Haegen and Clémence Van Muylder who have always been available, collaborative, serious and engaged in our files.’

‘The international arbitration department is excellent and very reputed.’

‘Olivier van der Haeghen does an outstanding job for us in international litigation.’

‘The firm has an excellent understanding of our business needs.’

‘The firm adapts themselves to our goals in the trial.’

‘When Loyens & Loeff Belgium’s dispute resolution team was handling our case, I had the feeling that no case would be too complex for them. They quickly get to the bottom of the dispute and clearly explain the procedural aspects and risks. They are super dedicated and easy to approach.’

‘A special call out for Maria-Clara Van den Bossche, who is very knowledgeable, proactive and quickly unravels the sensitivities in our case.’

‘High quality team. Excellent strength in depth. Tactical thinkers with excellent technical skills.’

‘We have instructed a team led by partners Stan Brijs and Sophie Jacmain. Tactical thinkers with excellent technical skills. Associate Nicolas Vande Velde is talented junior with excellent case management skills.’

‘The service levels are very high and, as a client, we are extremely satisfied by the firm’s quick and timely responses to issues. The team are always responsive and pay attention to the client’s needs. The team has extensive experience and willingness to provide concrete solutions and dedicated efforts to our case.’

‘The individuals we work with are always quick to respond and provide an excellent service. They are dedicated, intelligent, supportive and proactive. I could mention Stan Brijs, Sophie Jacmain, Nicolas Vande Velde and Gisele Uwera. They are outstanding with a wide range and a high level of commitment, especially for complex and diverse topics.’

‘Well organised team of hardworking and skilled individuals.’

‘Each partner and associate is specialised in a specific area of law that is relevant in a banking environment. Karel De Smet deserves praise in his proactive approach.’

‘NautaDutilh has a strong litigation practice, which has become a key player in the Belgian market. They are involved in almost all the major French and Dutch litigation cases, which demonstrates their reputation. They have become a force to be reckoned with in the Belgian market, with one of the biggest and best teams.’

‘Excellent team that is efficient on a lot of legal matters.’

‘Oliver Stevens is a very tough litigator, goes the extra mile for his clients, is very proactive.’

‘Stibbe’s arbitration team is simply the best in Brussels. They have an impressive ability to understand large volumes of complex factual and legal information and to synthesise it in a way that can be understood by any tribunal.’

‘The stand out individuals in the team are Nicolas ésimont and Sophie Bourgois. Nicolas argues cases with a passion that is rare amongst his peers. Nicolas’ style of advocacy is both persuasive and instils confidence in clients and tribunals alike. Sophie is meticulous. Sophie can take the most complex facts and legal arguments and argue them passionately and persuasively before any tribunal.’

‘Stibbe are the go-to firm for international arbitration in Brussels.’

‘Friendly and responsive team.’

‘Dorothée Vermeiren is adept at making the client feel supported whilst being realistic about strengths and weaknesses of a case.’

‘The team is responsive, straight to the point, and provides an excellent summary and advice for non-lawyers.’

‘Excellent teamwork; partner gets very involved.’

‘The dispute resolution practice stands out with its proactive approach and in-depth knowledge, delivering invaluable insights and strategic advice to its clients. Their commitment to client satisfaction is evident in their high level of availability and deep understanding of the legal and regulatory landscape. This practice’s ability to anticipate and address issues sets them apart as a client-focused legal partner. For those seeking proactive legal counsel with a forward-looking perspective, this practice is undeniably a top choice.’

‘I had the pleasure to work with Dorothée Vermeiren. Dorothée brings a wealth of experience and expertise to the table. Her proactive approach and in-depth knowledge are truly remarkable, consistently providing invaluable insights and strategic advice. Dorotheé’s high level of availability and ability to anticipate and address issues sets her apart from competitors.’

‘The team is are well organised, very customer-oriented, and a real pleasure to work with!’

‘Tom Bauwens is an authority in Belgium, an excellent lawyer. He succeeded in building a high quality team!’

‘Monica Rodriguez really stands out, she is exceptional in many ways. She has a deep knowledge of criminal law, ensures that she always has perfect case knowledge and presents everything in a very clear and intelligent way. Very exceptional! A real pleasure to work with her! Someone you can 100% rely on and goes the extra mile for her clients!’

‘They have experts in all areas, which means they have the right person in the right place at all times. They make a very good assessment of the chances of success and give 100%. They strictly adhere to all deadlines and provide feedback in the meantime. They remain realistic in what they promise and listen very carefully to their customer’s feedback.’

‘Eubelius is very unique to me personally in their approach to lawsuits. They combine excellent technical knowledge with a very personalised approach to the client. They are also extremely innovative if there are not immediate solutions to certain obstacles in legal proceedings. When they are asked a question, you are guaranteed to have a very quick and complete answer. In other words, they offer an excellent service that can no longer be improved!’

‘Personally, I have worked with several of their lawyers in some very complex and lengthy proceedings. All of them were simply excellent both on a human level and in terms of their technical knowledge. They were able to explain things to me in a clear and simple way. They were always available and gave the kind of help that was more than just legal support!’

‘Outstanding knowledge, dedicated to stand for their clients day and night. Unmatched availability. Probably the best known team in Belgium in their field of expertise.’

‘Monica Rodriguez is one of the rising stars in white-collar crime litigation cases. She is a senior attorney of the criminal enforcement & compliance department and the right hand of Tom Bauwens. She is well regarded for her all-round procedural knowledge and great diligence. She is highly client-focused and is known for her very thorough case knowledge and extremely high availability.’

‘Janson has the multidisciplinary and multilingual approach that is necessary in Belgium and at the border of different cultures.’

‘Long-lasting collaboration with the same people builds confidence and improves the quality of the advice they give.’

‘One of the largest litigation teams in the Belgian market, and a reference in corporate disputes. Built around Dominique Blommaert, who is the absolute rainmaker of Janson.’

‘Dominique Blommaert: fierce courtroom fighter, strong negotiator. Jens Bennoot: up and coming.’

‘Pragmatic, efficient, complementary, reacting very quickly, always searching for the best solution for clients.’

‘Dominique Blommaert and Ruth Declerck are very reactive, no-nonsense, think out of the box, and are very convincing. The feeling is that they really defend our rights in a very constructive and intelligent way without wasting any time.’

‘A team that is available and responsive. They are to the point and don’t waste time with pointless discussions.’

‘Jens Benoot and Lydie Van Muylem particularly stood out as they are client-driven and good practitioners who know their subject and know how to use the right arguments in litigation matters.’

‘All the people involved, especially Xavier Taton and Guillaume Croisant, operate like clockwork together. They have always supported us from a multidisciplinary perspective, without the person who started working with us at the beginning (Guillaume) ever losing sight of the whole.’

‘Their response times are unbeatable, the quality of all documents delivered and the quality of their interventions are something I have never seen before working with other firms. It is as if they were all one and we never have the feeling that there was a question left unanswered. On the contrary: they go above and beyond and always manage to surprise us with their ability to anticipate potential problems.’

‘Guillaume Croisant has been working on this issue with us since the beginning and it is amazing how easily he is able to recall and pick up on issues that have been in the works for years.’

‘Xavier Taton has shown himself to be a privileged mind, with a capacity for conviction and persuasion (without losing his serenity) that I have never seen before: he can summarise the essence of all the issues so well that it is simply impossible to disagree with him.’

‘Strong legal insights and tactical approach in settlement negotiations.’

‘Florence Danis is simply the one you want defending your case in court.’

‘Lydian has one of the largest litigation teams in the Belgian market which allows them to deal with all sort of litigation matters. It is very convenient to have a direct entry point for all litigation matters. Moreover Lydian has a regional focus which allows them to know the courts very well and consequently act efficiently.’

‘Hugo Keulers is very experienced, always seeing the greater picture, innovative, and has your interests at heart.’

‘Jo Willems is experienced, acts in your interests and is always on point.’

‘I worked with Marijn De Ruysscher on a cross-border file that involved Luxembourg aspects. He was always available and keen to assist us with any difficulty.’

‘Yves Lenders is a go-to partner who can assist you in any matter regarding litigation.’

‘Tim van Landeghem and Jo Willems provided very pragmatic advice on the spot in a timely and very precise manner.’

‘Lydian is very experienced in handling complex matters and taking care of your interests.’

‘Lydian is very accessible, quickly available, has a wide variety of expertise available and manages to efficiently mobilise the necessary resources for the benefit of the case at hand. We find that Lydian’s lawyers quickly familiarise themselves with the file and provide to-the-point feedback at short notice. Lydian connects well with its clients and looks for their needs and values in order to respond to them as well as possible when handling the case.’

‘The Quinz dispute resolution team is able to attract blue-chip clients, and that is because they are really excellent in their work. They are able to explain complicated issues in a very simple manner, not only to their clients but also to courts and arbitral tribunals. And they win the cases that should be won, but also cases with smaller chances, just because they present it in an excellent way.’

‘Stijn De Dier is a very down-to-earth partner at Quinz with whom you can have open and honest discussions.’

‘Benoît Allemeersch is truly outstanding; a very analytical legal mind and great litigator.’

‘Benoit Allemeersch is a leading light in the area and he has the skill to be able to see when and how a deal or compromise can be reached.’

‘Stijn De Dier is an excellent adviser and has an eye for the detail of a complex case. At the same time he is able to cast a complex series of arguments and events into a cohesive and logical strategy.’

‘Anne-Sophie Houtmeyers – Highly responsive, very customer and solution-oriented, precise, very pragmatic approach.’

‘On top of extensive legal expertise, Gaetano Jannone is very reliable, always available, and has a great insight of his clients’ needs. It is a pleasure to work with him.’

‘As a company working in a very specific field, we appreciate that Strelia invested the time in getting to know our products in order to advise us accordingly. Strelia has always been a highly professional law firm on which we can count whenever we have a specific question. We appreciate their responsiveness and pragmatic hands-on approach.’

‘Joanna Kolber is an extraordinary and extremely intelligent partner of Strelia, thinking out of the box, constantly seeking the right arguments and position in court cases. She sees connections where others don’t see them, her communication is highly transparent and clear and she strives for perfection. She has a high IQ and EQ and is extremely engaged in going the extra mile for her clients.’

‘Sofie Onderbeke is a highly motivated associate of Strelia, genuinely interested, pleasant to work with, and motivated to deep dive into the documentation and additional information to strengthen our cases. She is the perfect tandem with Joanna Kolber.’

‘Joanna Kolber was extremely responsive, proactive and helpful. Joanna provided very commercial and reasonable advice to a client in a sensitive commercial dispute.’

‘Experienced and competent lawyers.’

‘Partners and in general lawyers collaborate very well with peers of other disciplines or sub-specialisations. Partners in charge are fully aware of what is going on in other areas of their firm.’

‘Alexander Hansebout is an outstanding lawyer and is very responsive.’

‘Solid dispute resolution practice with experience in the Belgian market.’

‘Alexander Hansebout stands out as an efficient partner, able to cut through complex litigation and deal with core issues.’

‘Altius advised us on a complex, high value contentious matter. They delivered a service of very high quality.’

‘Alexander Hansebout led the Altius team. He is a calm, reassuring voice in the midst of the sound and fury of litigation. He succeeded in effectively neutering the grandstanding approach adopted by the other party’s lead lawyer, and did so in a way that reduced the temperature of the discussions all round and paved the way for an ultimately successful settlement between the parties.’

‘I was referred to Alexander Hansebout as one of the best lawyers in enforcement matters and I have not been disappointed. Alexander has been extremely helpful, knowledgeable, available and obtained great results.’

‘Alexander Hansebout is bright, straight forward, clear in his advice with an exceptional knowledge of enforcement proceedings in Belgium. He is a go-to person for this kind of matter.’

‘Dirk Van Liedekerke is a stellar EU law and litigation counsel. He works with two excellent associates: Matthieu Van Lierde and Alexis Laes, who are both strong lawyers with great client management skills.’

‘I work with this team for its focus on EU law litigation. Its breadth of knowledge on the topic is impressive and its ability to adapt to different local proceedings enables it to use their EU prism in a variety of local matters.’

‘Dirk Van Liedekerke is simply impressive. He is the best EU advocate I have worked with, on litigation and regulatory matters. What distinguishes him from his peers is the combination of second to none knowledge of EU law, strategic thinking and sound judgement as well as his ability to communicate with his clients in light of their needs and priorities. Besides this, he is the most reactive partner I work with.’

‘This was our first dispute in the EU/Belgium. Fieldfisher was critical in helping us navigate the dispute. The dispute required cooperation between the commercial and disputes teams, and Fieldfisher handled this cooperation flawlessly.’

‘Maxime Berlingin and Esther Lanotte make a formidable, commercial, efficient and effective team. They collaborate across the expertise within the firm to help drive dispute outcomes that are favourable to the client and they take a proactive role in driving matters forward and looking for opportunities to resolve issues. Patient and thorough, they take the time required to understand the business drivers and ensure weaknesses and vulnerabilities are understood and taken into consideration as things progress.’

‘Maxime Berlingin and Esther Lanotte were indispensable in helping us prepare for and complete the mediation process. Esther’s discovery process was thorough, and Maxime’s counsel helped us resolve the dispute through mediation. From strategy to execution, Maxime and Esther served as exceptional partners, and their counsel was perfect.’

‘Jean-François Germain is very competent and specialised in dispute resolution and civil law.’

‘Jean-François Germain is specialized, academic and practical.’

‘Jean-François Germain and Esther Lanotte have great experience in arbitration which they conduct in a thoughtful and pragmatic manner.’

‘Fast growing team and practice that is extremely committed and dynamic.’

‘ I know Maxime Berlingin and Jean-François Germain in particular have very sharp legal knowledge and analysis – excellent judgment and outstanding negotiation skills.’

‘Robbie Tas is the best in Belgium in dispute resolution. He is very tactical, very intelligent and pragmatic. He can be patient to estimate what the adverse party will do, can be assertive when needed and is very good at finding solutions. The results he obtained so far are fantastic. Caroline Hotterbeeckx is very knowledgeable, has a fantastic style of communication and is very efficient.’

‘Excellent knowledgeable, shrewd and responsive team. Have great insight in the legal matters at hand and apply a very sensible strategy to obtain the best possible outcome for the client.’

‘Naomi Glibert: fantastic work ethic, very responsive, incredibly detail-oriented. Goes the extra mile and doesn’t hesitate to take any action to get/keep things moving. Robbie Tas: vast experience in dispute resolution, especially in corporate law. Aggressive when appropriate, but also balanced and cautious when needed. Has surrounded himself with a very capable team with the right mix of skills, who he empowers to work independently and take initiative, which is a sign of great leadership.’

‘Robbie Tas is an excellent, experienced litigator who combines thorough legal knowledge with strong soft skills and knows how to build a strong case. Caroline Hotterbeekx is very solid, she knows her files and is very responsive.’

‘Robbie Tas is a eminent leading partner and authority in Company Law, very well assisted by Pieter Van Braband, a skilful and communicative counsel.’

‘Very good availability. Not only profound legal knowledge, but also very helpful in light of discussing the general tactic to achieve a specific result. Very good reputation in the market for representing minority shareholders.’

‘Robbie Tas has strong academic roots. He also is a seasoned litigator, and simply one of the brightest lawyers out there. Caroline Hotterbeekx is very pragmatic, yet thorough and sensitive to the client’s needs. She is top-notch.’

‘The understanding of Philippe & Partners of both the industry and the specific needs and values of their clients sets them apart in the legal field.’

‘One of the standout qualities of Phillipe & Partners is their ability to align their approach with the values and style of their clients. They take the time to understand the client’s objectives, ensuring that the legal strategy is not only legally sound but also harmonises with the client’s values and goals. This level of service shows their commitment to their client’s satisfaction.’

‘What truly sets Philippe & Partners apart is their responsiveness and hands-on mentality. They are always readily available to address concerns, answer questions, and provide guidance. Moreover, Philippe & Partners’ dedication to their clients extends beyond the resolution of a dispute. Their excellent follow-up ensures that the client’s interests remain protected even after the case has concluded. This long-term commitment is truly commendable.’

‘The industry knowledge, client-centric approach, responsiveness, and dedication to client satisfaction make Philippe & Partners unique.’

‘Our company has been working with Dirk Clarysse for several years. His experience with our organisation has given him an exceptional insight into not only our business but also our core values and objectives. This familiarity has proven to be an invaluable asset in our collaboration.’

‘What sets Dirk Clarysse apart is his exceptional accessibility and responsiveness. Whether we require quick insights for minor matters or comprehensive assistance for substantial projects, Dirk Clarysse’s prompt and knowledgeable responses have made an impact. His experience allows him to navigate complex issues, making him an important partner for our company.’

‘Charlotte Romaen has consistently demonstrated an exceptional level of commitment. Her dedication is particularly evident in her outstanding follow-up and communication. Her insight into our priorities allows her to provide tailored solutions and guidance.’

‘Proactive, diligent and creative team. Very knowledgeable and experienced.’

‘Marco Schoups is a very competent lawyer with a lot of expertise in real estate and construction. Respected in the market by all actors which helps in negotiations, charming person and good negotiator.’

‘Schoups brings forward thinking experience and professionalism to the table and applies a collaborative approach in its case-handling. The team is accessible and capable of handling complex legal problems.’

‘Maarten Somers: experienced, leadership and resourceful; Els Op de Beeck: organised, detail-oriented and collaborative.’

‘High level of client proximity with a close follow-up on the pending cases of both the senior associates as well as the partner working on the case. Good team work of those teams members that are involved in the matter. High response rate. Great experience with arbitration proceedings and large network of arbitrators to ensure a qualitative procedure always with the client’s interest at the forefront.’

‘Marco Schoups – The experience of this partner with arbitration proceedings and dispute proceedings in general is of great value for the clients. The partner knows the specifics and key elements of the matter very well, even for highly complex cases. High availability and response rate for clients.’

‘Geert De Buyzer has great experience with all types of dispute resolution and deep knowledge of the law. He is able to explain complex legal matters in a clear and understandable manner. He has excellent communication skills, both in written and verbal communication. He is willing to go the extra mile for his clients and able to think outside the box and provide creative and effective legal solutions to complex problems.’

‘Kris Lemmens is a true expert in his domain and is very approachable.’

‘Koen De Puydt and Aline Heyrman are trilingual and active in the 3 parts of the country (Flanders, Wallonia and Brussels), allowing them to combine all the new trends and case law. This gives them an important added value.’

‘The dispute resolution team of Seeds of Law is a pleasure to work with. They are open minded, always questioning every step to assess what is in the best interest of the client, with a clear goal in mind. They work, think along and interact with the client and share all information, which helps the client to make the right decisions.’

‘Koen de Puydt is strategically very strong and will not easily give up. He goes for it and will fight in the interest of the client. Ulrike Beuselinck is able to convince the judges and courts, and drives them into the right direction. She is straightforward and can give clear messages to the clients, an approach they appreciate. She is energetic and enthusiastic.’

‘Roeland Moeyersons is a very practical no-nonsense litigator. Straight forward, and knows the tips and tricks of the courts. Steve Griess, although a very good litigator is a recognised and reputed mediator with the French speaking bar. As a mediator he is open and empathic, which allows him to bring disputing parties together to reach a solution and terlinate the dispute.’

‘Steve Griess and Thibault Caeymaex took a very pragmatic and efficient approach to the case. They are reliable, proactive and highly competent.’

‘Koen de Puydt is our main point of contact. Always available, quick response times.’

‘Laurius’ dispute resolution practice fields a reactive and knowledgeable team led by Bert Luyten. They are capable of analysing a situation with a holistic approach and therefore suggest technical and adequate means to solve existing and potential problems that clients are facing.’

‘Solutions offered and suggested to clients are tailor-made by a team who knows how to listen to clients.’

‘Excellent knowledge, a business mindset, and fast responses.’

‘The team is very practical and strategic in one. I have worked with them on several files and in each case their approach was solid and realistic, and the follow-up was always speedy.’

‘Bert Luyten and Karen Vermaere; both are very sharp minded litigators; knowledgeable, practical and creative, which is a wonderful combination. They know the Belgian litigation market extremely well and this helps in the guidance one needs as a client. A top go-to team!’

‘Bert Luyten has vast experience in litigation, is very smart, creative and practical.’

‘Stephanie Joris is an amazing person who supported my case, my business, my team, my partner and myself in the best way possible. Her overview on all procedures, in depth knowhow of all details, understanding of the business, honest and fast feedback. She is a smart and wise person in general that every entrepreneur would like to have in his/her team.’
